title: How tall is Kirk in Star Trek? - Quora
tags: Captain James T. Kirk (Star Trek character)
Star Trek: The Next Generation (TV series)

response.answer_text: I think that William Shatner was five eleven in those days.Wearing the Starfleet boots,he probably hit six feet.Leonard Nimoy was six one. That is why Spock was always a bit taller than his crewmates.
